sentences.en: A stout tailwind was giving a friendly boost.
sentences.cn: 一股强劲的顺风正在给予有利的推动.

sentences.en: Do what you can to give her confidence and boost her morale.
sentences.cn: 尽你所能让她树立信心，提高士气。

sentences.en: Economic theory suggests that the devalued pound will boost the economy.
sentences.cn: 经济学理论指出贬值的英镑将会促进经济的发展。

sentences.en: Get your body moving to boost energy, stay supple and shake off winter lethargy.
sentences.cn: 锻炼身体以增加活力，保持柔韧性，甩掉冬日的慵懒。

sentences.en: Give me a boost over the fence.
sentences.cn: 托我一把,帮我越过篱笆.

sentences.en: If you boost me up, I can just reach the window.
sentences.cn: 假如你托我一把, 我正好可以够到窗户.

sentences.en: It did give me a boost to win such a big event.
sentences.cn: 赢得如此重大的比赛确实使我信心倍增。

sentences.en: It would get the economy going and give us the boost that we need.
sentences.cn: 它将会推动经济发展，带来我们所需要的繁荣局面。

sentences.en: Lower interest rates can boost the economy by reducing borrowing costs for consumers and businesses.
sentences.cn: 低利率可以通过为消费者和商家降低借贷成本来促进经济发展。

sentences.en: Reduction in the tax on unearned income could be a boost for small businesses.
sentences.cn: 降低非劳动收入税可能会促进小企业的发展。

sentences.en: Shiraz has stitched up major deals all over the world to boost sales.
sentences.cn: 希拉兹已经在全球促成了几笔大宗协议的签订，以此来提高销量。

sentences.en: So go out there and boost your brainpower, your mind will thank you.
sentences.cn: 所以走出去提升你的智力，你的思想会感谢你自己。

sentences.en: Some scientists claim that vitamins will boost your child's IQ score.
sentences.cn: 一些科学家宣称维生素可以提高孩子的智商.

sentences.en: The move is designed to boost sales during the peak booking months of January and February.
sentences.cn: 这一举措旨在增加1月和2月预订高峰期的销售量。

sentences.en: The movie helped boost her screen career.
sentences.cn: 那部电影有助于她的银幕生涯的发展。

sentences.en: The new resort area has boosted tourism.
sentences.cn: 新的度假区促进了旅游业的发展。

sentences.en: The win boosted the team’s confidence.
sentences.cn: 这一场胜利增加了球队的信心。

sentences.en: These changes will help to boost share prices.
sentences.cn: 这些变化将有助于提高股票价格.

sentences.en: to boost exports/profits
sentences.cn: 增加出口；提高利润

sentences.en: We need a holiday to boost our spirits.
sentences.cn: 我们需要休假以激发士气.

trans.tran_cn: 帮助，激励，增长，提高，向上一推
trans.tran_en: something that gives someone more confidence, or that helps something increase, improve, or become successful
to increase or improve something and make it more successful

trans.tran_cn: 推， 举； 促进； 吹捧
trans.tran_en: to increase or improve something and make it more successful

trans.tran_cn: 提高，使增长；推动，激励；替…做广告，宣扬
trans.tran_en: if a  rocket  or motor boosts a  spacecraft  , it makes it go up into space or go in a particular direction
